website_summaries.verdict: One of the best ways to increase your ATV's audio capabilities in an affordable manner. Small and convenient for small vehicles.
pros: Comes as a soft diaphragm tweeter that pipes out music from both ends
Can connect any audio device, including smart phones, via the included auxiliary capable
cons: Doesn't match the volume and sound of some larger ATV speakers

customer_reviews.title: Fix these issues and its great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say these are loud well built speakers ... But boss cut corners on some things i feel shouldnt happen .. first off where the plugs come out of the tube i was wrapping the wires around my handle bars and it came right out of the case that i thought they where sealed in with silicone (pics below) and the other was the cheap made lighter style power plug that fell apart on me and only had one screw and as i went in and out of plugging it in just fell apart on my second week... other then that wonderful sounding speakers and hope i can get a new set that isnt defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this for my boyfriend as a birthday gift and I have never seen anyone be so happy ! He mounted it on his Polaris Scrambler 850 and it was a perfect fit. The sound quality is amazing . It is loud enough as to where he was able to listen to it while driving his four wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: This boasts of a built in 450 watt amp. ...
customer_reviews.text: This boasts of a built in 450 watt amp. With the volume up to 100% and a fan on in my garage, I could not hear my music. Once I started the engine on my off road buggy, the sound was completely drowned out. I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: So far they're good and loud even when Riding... Update they started just making a popping sound when you turn the power on to them..call customer support but I got hung up on..update still not working called support again and had to destroy it now they wont answer my emails..
customer_reviews.author: Scott petty

customer_reviews.title: Boss has gone down in quality!!
customer_reviews.text: The overall look is good and by all appearances looked to be a great product. Unfortunately as soon as I connected my phone to the system via auxiliary cord there was a loud high pitched sound that came out of the speakers consistantly. I then connected my music via bluetooth and lost about 30% of the volume....even worse the speakers and tweeters emitted crackling and popping noises while playing my music. Save your money and spend it on something else that is of higher quality. I have owned a boss atv audio system before and loved it....lasted about 5 years. I think Boss needs to reasses the quality of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and the sound is in a word, "fantastic" and balanced from highs, mids, and lows. Hats off! I use it as my outdoor, portable, amplified system for my projector movie night(s). The lack of a star is for questioning the advertised amplification power, Its loud and clear, however it doesn't keep up with my Alpine car amp. That is based on my ears and not a measuring device. Just to re-iterate, the clarity and quality of sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long before cord fried out.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a few uses before power cord burnt up. Not the detachable piece either, the part of the cord connected to the speaker. So hot it left a red mark on my hand when I picked the cord up. Speaker system wouldn't come on, but I could hear the speakers crackling. So I made sure the power pushed all the way in and it was and slid my hand back up the cord and when I passed the connector where you can change between cigarette lighter power and battery ATV connections, it was smoking hot!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Payne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap poor structure
customer_reviews.text: I opened box and seen that there was a sticky residue on all seams. I installed it on and took of for camping trip. I took for first ride and as soon as I took of less than a 1/4 mile down trail it started to fall apart. Its cheap PVC pipe that looks like it was put together by someone in their garage. I didnt get a full song out of it before it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Get your own mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great! The parts to mount the components could be better. We ended up mounting remote directly to the bike as the handlebar mounts are tacky. We also installed power directly from the battery and added a power switch in the dry box. We didn't want the led to affect the battery if the bike stayed parked too long. The straps have single stitched Velcro that was starting to fall apart during installation. If all items needed to securely mount wires and decent straps were included this would definitely get 5 stars across the board
customer_reviews.author: Ray LaBauve

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I like this speaker system a lot! It's light and sturdy and build well. Feels solid and sounds really amazing considering. Super happy with it for my atv front rack. And it's the perfect size so I can still fit my snorkels on the rack also! I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: DAD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud for having a built in amp and the wires shorted out within a few days to one side of the speakers rendering this a waste of money. Got a response to review telling me to create a ticket with BOSS did that and have yet to get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Always Cleaning

customer_reviews.title: First one arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was broken when I received it. Only the right side speakers worked. Amazon sent me another one and I sent the first one back. Looked on my email and amazon told me thanks for reviewing the product and it had filled in 5 stars and wrote “it is worth recommending”. Good thing a caught it before it published. What kind of propaganda is going on on amazon?!??? Not to happy.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish king

customer_reviews.title: Speaker fire
customer_reviews.text: We had the speaker for about a month it was epic I loved it . But it started acting up one day and wouldn’t turn on. So after messing with it for about 30 minutes I gave up . Well when I went to start my four wheeler all this sudden smoke starter rolling out from under the seat. It was the speaker wire on fire . Lucky I put it out in time before I hurt anything else. I was still able to ride put with no music but now I don’t want to bug one of this . But I could of just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband for father's day. Installation was easy and it worked great for less than two months. When it first started messing up the volume would sound like it was in a hole and then it started making a squealing noise that was worse than nails on a chalk board. Boss does not leave their contact information on the order so it took a few phone calls to figure out how to get in touch with them. Boss will not refund or send a new one. I have to pay shipping cost to send it to them for them to repair. Disappointed is an understatement!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Seemed used???
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived the box had been opened and the seal cut. After unboxing it was obvious that there were some issues. The one wire was worn cut and it would not connect with Bluetooth no matter what we did. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J. Landes

customer_reviews.title: love the loud boom!
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my husbands birthday. he loves listening to music, it is super loud (like he likes it). i wish that it would have also came with a regular cord for our power converter but we bought one and it works great. i would definantly recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Linn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stand a chance in rain
customer_reviews.text: Was rained on. Hasn’t worked since. Wasn’t in water for a long time. Missed my return date so we’re stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker but not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker..for the few times we used it. This is most def not weatherproof. We got caught in a rain shower and the speaker hasn’t worked to it’s full potential since.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gros Garibotte

customer_reviews.title: and it looks like somebody hit it i
customer_reviews.text: I got it quick but one speaker cover is totally fadded, it looks grey, and it looks like somebody hit it i, a bunch of random places with sandpaper, looks like S*** really, spend so much money to get something that looks like this is pitiful
customer_reviews.author: lucas h.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Being Produced, But 2 Flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this unit on my Suzuki Kingquad 400 ASI, and it produced excellent sound and bass. So far, I've only had 2 flaws. One, the speakers did not properly mount correctly, so they had wobbled back and fourth. From then, I have put the packaging foam underneath it to protect it. The second flaw is the right side speaker has failed to work. It has been blown out, for an unknown reason. There is no sound except from the bass that flows throughout the tube from the other side. Although could be from too much water in the past 2 1/2 months since I have purchased this product. Otherwise, this product performs excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: ... would have to say that this is a very nice speaker, It works good around the farm where ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have to say that this is a very nice speaker, It works good around the farm where I can listen to music while I work, but the reason I didn't give this 4 stars is because for the pplay/pause button, they forgot to send me the z backet part for mounting it. I am going to give them a call hoping they will do the right thing and send me a new one. Other than that it works great! beautiful sound!
customer_reviews.author: Braydon A.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality sound for the price!  This thing KICKS!
customer_reviews.text: This thing absolutely KICKS ASS!! Me and my friends who I ride with can't believe the quality of sound that this thing produces! AMAZING deal for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Dean_R

customer_reviews.title: Good but don't spend the extra money on the bluetooth ones.
customer_reviews.text: They can get pretty loud but not using bluetooth with my ipod. I used these for awhile and they seemed way under powered. I figured out it was the bluetooth. I wouldn't buy the bluetooth version again. Using the headphone jack they work really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Recommend/must have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect, best part is that you can take it anywhere and sync anything Bluetooth to it. I loved playing my loud music in my Jeep!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie B

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get this for Christmas pony to be disappointed when it didnt have all the parts. It was missing the fuse and the plug part to be able to hook it up. It was a great buy but the missing parts was disappointing to him. Unfortunately there isnt a way to contact the seller for them to correct the issue without having to return it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice SxS Speaker System
customer_reviews.text: I installed this unit on a 2014 Can-Am Maverick. Works extremely well and has a nice bass punch. I considered more expensive systems, but decided to give BOSS a try. No regrets and would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: DeShon Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Great for golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Installed on my sons golf cart. They sound great. Be aware that the control feature has a aux out line permanently attached to it. I took mine apart and removed it and then sealed the housing up. I think people will buy this for the wireless feature so I see no point in keeping this line in production.
customer_reviews.author: TIM HARBER

customer_reviews.title: Speaker quit working
customer_reviews.text: After just a few months one speaker stopped working. We sent it back to BOSS at our own expense $90. They sent us a new one, installed that one and pop! Neither speakers worked! Sent that one back (they paid form UPS this time) so now we wait.
customer_reviews.author: Julie7508

customer_reviews.title: Thumped away!!
customer_reviews.text: This is mounted in the back of my 78 CJ5 and it has amazing sound quality. The top isn't off for the summer yet, so anxious to see how it does in the rain, but with doors off, rear window rolled up and cruising at 70mph the sound is perfect. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: John Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Not made for atv , the plug in for the control ( Bluetooth, pause stop skip) is junk worked good util I washed it with a hose and then quit working. Never will buy again! The older model with out the controller is the way to go. This was my 2nd one , 1st one didn't work out of the box, bad connector for the controller
customer_reviews.author: Eric Blakeley

customer_reviews.title: Good when it wants to work
customer_reviews.text: it was great when I first got it after a few weeks of using it the aux cable wires just pulled out of the plug and when it works it sounds great but it constantly goes in and out in and out and it gets annoying it seems like it has a short in the wires , the audiotube itself is weather proof but the remote that comes with it to put in your handle bar is not weather proof it's already messing up and I have only had it a month or two I only ride once a week and I keep it stored in a building when I'm not riding so that tells you how crappy it is!!
customer_reviews.author: Itsbrittany100

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great but it could be a little louder
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great but it could be a little louder. I have it facing our backs on the side by side but I am sure it would be loud on the front rack of a 4 wheeler facing you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope they are not selling used items as new.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened with this product but it was upsetting. It was a Christmas gift. When my son removed the speaker it seemed undamaged, but the product booklet was all muddy and yet! I just hope they are not trying to sell used items as new. The speaker did not work properly, so I can only assume it was used!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kim Daigrepont

customer_reviews.title: You cannot just replace the speaker because it is attached to a ton of wires on a soundboard.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker was attached to my side-by-side ATV. Suddenly this speaker begin to thump on both speakers. You cannot just replace the speaker because it is attached to a ton of wires on a soundboard.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Strait

customer_reviews.title: This product is definitely not waterproof the components inside very cheap not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Product can only get splashed on do not submerged underwater is NOT waterproof water resistant with a garden hose maybe do not recommend if you are riding your ATV in deep water or installing on back rack not even an option
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 opened only the one box and used it on my last Atv trip the right side speaker stopped working Very cheap won’t buy again. Not happy with not being able to return it just passed my 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew f

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is okay
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked great and sounded great. I could still hear my music while traveling 50 mph on the trails. The downside is I only used it for one summer on my fourwheeler before the welds inside the plug came apart. Now I have to fix the plug before I can use it again.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: right now I am using it as a second subwoofer for tv movies. works great
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mattison

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's the brand?
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one we've bought and the second with problems. As soon as I got it I plugged it in and heard a loud screeching sound. It did play music but did so at a low volume level and well below the obnoxiously loud screeching sound.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Will have to see why it’s not coming on now ( I do have 12v) I wouldn’t recommend build your own it is not loud especially when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought in mid November literally used maybe 5 times it is now beginning of April, 5 months later and it stopped working. Will have to see why it’s not coming on now ( I do have 12v) I wouldn’t recommend build your own it is not loud especially when riding you can barely hear it with the volume all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: This puppy jams. Great sound quality.btough little buggar and great price. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Speaker sounds good, but the controller connection broke after my second ...
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounds good ,but the controller connection broke after my second use. Now there is no way to turn the speaker on. A wireless speaker that doesn't work because the wire broke.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Too big.
customer_reviews.text: Too big for many applications in my opinion. Seems to be of good quality. I bought it for my jetski but there is no way it will stay on that thing when jumping. Install speakers in your hull.
customer_reviews.author: jason s foltz

customer_reviews.title: Distortion kick in pretty bad as the volume gets above 75% or so
customer_reviews.text: Distortion kick in pretty bad as the volume gets above 75% or so. Not the best quality amp and definately not the rated wattage in the real world but at a lower volume, it isn't bad. At driving speeds it gets hard to hear the music without distortion so that's a disappointment but again, at slower speeds, it's not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Donald I Baiter

customer_reviews.title: Defective system
customer_reviews.text: System does not work. Speakers work but the main power board does not power on the primary speaker. Can’t return this unit because this is a custom build project but the system did not work straight out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Shover

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: can barely hear it on full volume, i tried 3 cell phones to see if that was the problem. then one speaker fell out, do not buy this, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but is it worth it
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 3 for sound quality cause I used it 3 times, washed my atv off now I am getting feedback from a tweeter. Like a loud buzzing. I don’t know what’s going on. And it keeps cutting in and out with my Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Tony Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speaker system
customer_reviews.text: So far the best speakers in this form factor. Pair it with PowerAMP player on Android and you got unparalleled sound signature and bass response from these. 6.5" versions don't have that bass response especially at lower volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ....fits perfect We use the Velcro straps around lower back of rollbar and Then to keep it from bouncing up and down on trails Secure it with a ratchet strap....
customer_reviews.author: devon

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Use in small towns and community parades to play marching band music. It is loud and clear enough to make spectators think a 100 piece marching band is coming
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy C Neal Sr

customer_reviews.title: JUNK DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, save your money. Didn't make it thru the 1st ride on the 1st set of speakers. Replaced them and the 2nd set never made it to a ride. Both sets had the same problem, left speaker intermittent inop. Junk, don't waste your money!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound quality. Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Sound is awful and cracks if you turn the volume up or the volume will not work with the Bluetooth at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grove17264

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and good value
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the money. It's a tight fit in the top of my Rzr though. It has to have the speakers facing the rear window to fit. A very tall person might have to mount it in a different location.
customer_reviews.author: Countyline

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Speaker worked but remote cord doesn’t work can’t use it without therefore the speaker is worthless
customer_reviews.author: martycoar

customer_reviews.title: sounds great made cheap
customer_reviews.text: My son has this on his 4 wheeler and it sounds great! However he was carrying it and dropped it on the ground, one of the speaker magnets broke off and now only plays through one. Treat with care and don't expect to ride hard with this mounted on ATV.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sansing

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be a little louder for top speed riding but for cruising it does awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS CHEAP POS
customer_reviews.text: Awful product, got my original item and the connector pin broke as soon as I plugged them in together. Amazon sent another one to me and it quit working after 35 days, Amazon says to call the manufacturer because Amazon does not honor returns after 30 days. The manufacturer will repair it, but could take up to 50 days and you have to pay shipping both ways and the box is huge. Product is cheaply made and WILL NOT LAST... BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: Got it quickly. Nice. Sounds amazing. Don't expect to mount it to a razor or any utv. It has cheap velcro straps and no way to bolt it down. I'll have to weld some bars up to make a top shelf to hold it and keep it from swinging and you won't hit your head as you sit down. Can't remove chairs either. Horrible install design. Sounds great though
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Eric Banks

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Broke after 1 ride.
customer_reviews.text: Sounded good for 1 ride. System shorted out on the second ride and can't get it to come back on. Garbage, it's sitting in my garage broken, the amp is fried. It never even got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Colgin

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap malfunctioning speaker with no power!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this item! The sound is crappy and low. This 8 “ speaker have very little power and the Bluetooth remote malfunctions. I had to swap out these cheap speakers with infinity speakers and put a rockford fosgate amp on them to produce a good quality sound. Horrible product on the level of a radio shack speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin laird

customer_reviews.title: It is built poorly
customer_reviews.text: The pvc pipe is cheap. I have had it less than a month and it is coming apart. The cigarette lighter plug and outlet are trash. The wires came right out of the outlet and the end came off of the plug. I suggest buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Noah Boyett

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but not at all durable. Sound quality is poor. Broke within the first week.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Madison

customer_reviews.title: DEAD ON ARRIVAL!! Speakers pop and crackle and NFC controller DEAD!! PURE TRASH!!
customer_reviews.text: DEAD ON ARRIVAL!! PURE GARBAGE!! Speakers pop and NFC controller is dead and never lit up. WORTHLESS!! I will NEVER Buy ANYTHING from BOSS audio and let everyone know to not buy trash like this.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Trader

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these speakers in August and they have been nothing but trouble. When hooked up to the Aux only one speaker works(left speaker works). When the Bluetooth is turned on one the other one works(right speaker works). I had the 6in ones prior and those worked great. I never had any sort of problems or complaints. I purchased the 8inch speakers because I wanted louder ones. I wouldn't suggest these size speakers or purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandria

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the sound, not happy with the plug in.
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker, loud and crisp. Love the remote feature and Bluetooth for apple music for the price! However the 12v adaptor wasnt very tight and came apart when I unplugged it from my 4 wheeler. Had to take it back bc the plug in tore up.
customer_reviews.author: Matteo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my 4 wheeler. I hooked my phone to it to listen to music. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kingfan

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: On my first trip out to the dunes and this thing took a crap
customer_reviews.author: derrik sharbono

customer_reviews.title: It really truly a plus for me
customer_reviews.text: My husband can't stop playing and riding our atv now lol
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Fair

customer_reviews.title: Apparently is not waterproof like it says.
customer_reviews.text: I rode with it one time for about 3 or 4 hours and it don't work no more!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly sayre

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good and clear. Loud enough to hear over atv motor. Easy install, looks good on front rack.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound system
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding and rugged. Perfect for my hunting mud boat
customer_reviews.author: David franklin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to install. Down side is that you can't hear very well with a helmet on.
customer_reviews.author: plinker62

customer_reviews.title: need volume control
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like that you could play/pause & go ahead or behind a song but there was no volume control so if you came to ca quick stop to chat with another 4 wheeler than u need to pull out ur cell phone and adjust volume that way
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine, may want the bigger one if want to be able to hear when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came with everything awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for the money didn't expect it to sound so good a buddy listened to it and bought one also
customer_reviews.author: Brad bohannon

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I like to ride our side by side at our lake ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I like to ride our side by side at our lake home, not big into mudding. We bought the AVT85B and was very excided about having a nice radio on our ride and sound good. Not two months after getting it and riding through some rain shower, it died. Water proof I think not. It cost $210.36 and it cost $96.21 to send it back for repair or replacement. Think twin....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I have the smaller 6
customer_reviews.text: I luv it. Great sound. I have the smaller 6.5 version, But this 8 inch BLOWS the doors off and no static. Plays very clear and LOUD !!Thanks !!It's a Great Buy !!
customer_reviews.author: William J Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Was great! Until it wasn't.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving this two stars because of it's sudden death. No crackling, no randomly shutting off, just woke up one day (I use mine in a Jeep Wrangler as my only speakers) and it wouldn't turn no matter how long I held the button down. It's not the outlet, that still works with other things. For the amount of time that it worked, (under a year) it was great, didn't have to bother with installing anything but still had very decent volume and sound quality. This was an investment, so I really wish Boss could help me out with fixing it, really don't feel like figuring out how to ship this thing somewhere...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: No instructions provided but it is pretty easy to understand and would not play music
customer_reviews.text: #1 reason is the product didn't work right out of the box. No instructions provided but it is pretty easy to understand and would not play music. #2 they shipped me the non-bluetooth system and even with the AUX it didn't play music from my iPhone. Plus, I bought this for my boat and I really don't see it being a fit but if I had an PWC or ATV I think it would be much better. (if it worked). Go with the Pyle Street Blaster PBMSPG100 Rugged and Portable Bluetooth Wireless System. I purchased that for less money and it works better than I expected. Although, the Pyle Street Blaster isn't as waterproof as the BOSS system.
customer_reviews.author: DHut

customer_reviews.title: Works great a great product from Boss
customer_reviews.text: It sounds really good only have a couple rides on it but hosed it down wit them still installed still works fine sounds good and the bluetooth distance is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy hook up and you could hear the music threw a Forrest
customer_reviews.author: Keith D

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could be louder...
customer_reviews.text: Super easy set up on the ranger. Plugs into the 12v plug and the blue tooth is cool. Connect the iphone and away you go. It's not as loud as I had hoped. The speakers face front and is zip tied to the real roll bar, so maybe the awind at 50mph distorts the music but I could barely hear it. At slow speeds it sounds great. If I could make it louder it would be perfect, other than that it is worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Justin Robash

customer_reviews.title: already have one this is bad ass i got one mounted on my raptor 700r ...
customer_reviews.text: already have one this is bad ass i got one mounted on my raptor 700r se and this one is going on my can am xmr 1000
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, had to make bracket to mount it on utv. Straps are not strong enough. Pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Billy M. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he LOVES IT!! Said we all need to buy one now lol!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Not weatherproof
customer_reviews.text: Not weatherproof, water got in and fried the circut board
customer_reviews.author: Olga Baca

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the $
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for the money. Have only had it a week so we’ll see how long it lasts and I haven’t had it in any wet conditions
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband put these on his four wheeler they work great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a little under powerd
customer_reviews.text: great addition to my ATV. starts to distort when your phone volume reaches about 3/4% max but still has plenty volume to hear very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relatively easy to install but it would have been nice to ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install but it would have been nice to have the female part of the cigarette lighter plug to have a inline fuse already built in and not to have to buy extra part. Speakers sounds good and im happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gator T

customer_reviews.title: Haven't even got to fully enjoy it because every time I start to ride it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only works when it wants to. Haven't even got to fully enjoy it because every time I start to ride it goes into limp mode and flashe''s red on the controller. Won't connect to bluetooth,aux will not work. All in all its a piece of junk. Now I'm out 120 for something I didn't even use once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping the company will make this right and send me one that works
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work right out of the box. Turns itself all the way down every minute or so. Very disappointed. Really was looking forward to having it on my quad.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our ATV. We originally purchased a different brand and it never worked so we returned it and bought this one. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kim A. Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, love it. we get lots of compliments. We have it on our Teyrx
customer_reviews.author: Dora Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Other than that ice been very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. Although the mounting straps leave a little to be desired. Other than that ice been very happy with it. It sounds great and its proven to be pretty dang tough. If it weren't for the straps Id give it 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mr S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME! I ride ALOT and love music, so this a great addition to my ATV!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Staples

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbage......blow out soon as i plugged my phone in and turned it up......not worth it....
customer_reviews.author: Vinson chatman

customer_reviews.title: works great and is very loud
customer_reviews.text: We bought heavy duty (175 pound) zip ties separately and mounted this to the rooftop bars of our Polaris ranger, works great and is very loud! Much cheaper than purchasing/installing a stereo system
customer_reviews.author: Aleisia

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Works perfect on my 2014 Honda Rancher
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Works perfect on my 2014 Honda Rancher. Would be nice if it came with switch to cut off power without disconnecting plug. Also, cover on female end of plug that connects to battery to keep dust out when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Lee

customer_reviews.title: Well enough for the money...
customer_reviews.text: First allow me to say, it sounds great. Nice rich sound for a cheaper option, clear highs and mids, with nice base, I feel like it could be louder, it is louder than my Polaris 850 V-Twin, it may be just right for some, I like it loud! The unit I received did not come with all the hardware, and is obviously a used unit, nothing I can't deal with. The plugin doesn't work, but the Bluetooth does, which is fine I don't want to use the plug anyway. I feel like I got a decent deal, would've liked the mounting hardware, but like I said nothing I can't work around.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Moody

product_meta.title: Boss Audio Systems ATV25B ATV UTV Waterproof Sound System - 6.5 Inch Speakers, 1 Inch Tweeters, Built-in Amplifier, Bluetooth Remote, Easy Installation for 12 Volt Vehicles
product_meta.description:
Style:6.5 Inch Bluetooth with Wired RemoteGet outdoors and pump out your tunes while you're on your ATV, tailgating or camping with the Boss Audio ATV25B Weatherproof Powersports Plug & Play System. Compatible with any 12V power source, enjoy great sound with the 450 Watt Max Power Amp, 6.5" Poly Injection Cone Speakers and 1.5" High Performance Dome Tweeters. Hook the Audio Output of your Smartphone or MP3 Player to the Auxiliary Input to listen to your playlists. Bluetooth Stream and Control lets you play and control your favorite music apps like Spotify and Pandora. Control Play, Pause, Track and Volume with the Bluetooth Inline Multifunction Remote. The ATV25B is Fully Marinized to help provide protection against the elements. Max out your music wherever you go with the Boss Audio ATV25B. 

For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth - Built-in Bluetooth automatically reconnects to the last device. Stream your music library from your smartphone or MP3 player or use apps such as Spotify and Pandora
Auxiliary Input - 3.5 mm aux-in compatible with audio output of iPod / iPhone, smartphones and MP3 players
Weatherproof - The ATV25B has been outfitted with the latest weatherproofing techniques for protection against the elements
Amplified - The speakers and tweeters are powered by a high performance built-In 450 watt class A/B amplifier
Easy Setup - Bring power to the ATV25B in just seconds by plugging in the cigarette lighter power cord
Contents - 2 mounting straps, 2 nylon zip straps, power accessory extension adaptor, user manual, warranty card
Specs - Dimensions: 26” x 9.5” x 7.5”, Weight: 12.45 lbs.

Warranty - BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3 year Platinum Online Dealer Warranty so long as the purchase is made through Amazon.com. We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars819 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: 2-Heavy Duty Zip Ties, Boss Audio Atv25B Powersports Plug And Play Audio System With Weather Proof 6.5 Inch Component Speakers, 2-Heavy Duty Straps
